name: Corridors of Doom3: The Origin of Evil
name_original: Corridors of Doom3: The Origin of Evil
description:
Corridors of Doom returns with it's newest installment,

featuring 4x the size of Corridors of Doom 2, 16x the detail, breathtaking new features and a story with a never seen depth.

In Corridors of Doom3: The Origin of Evil you will find out where the Faceman came from and what his first victims were. 

Multiple endings, cutscenes, combat and even more intense chase scenes (all of this just works.) and much more build the core of our efforts to haunt the nightmares of the users of this website once again.

Story:

You are Willy, a not so skillful pizza baker apprentice, you are haunted by nightmares in which you see a room with a bed in some sort of bunker. But enough sleep time to go to work.

Controls:

WASD - Moving

J - Quest Book

TAB - Inventory

R - Reload

F - Interact

H - Suicide
